data.title: 在 Apple silicon 上使用 Docker
data.subtitle: 记录一下使用的 Docker 镜像
data.content:
去年拿了一个省政府奖学金然后存是不可能去存的，所以就去买了一个 Mac Mini 2020 玩玩，结果到手后发现 Docker Desktop 还没适配emmm，不过还好还有 Parallels Desktop，然后就装了一个虚拟机去跑 Docker 了，然后就发现，gitlab-ce 之类的官方镜像都没有 arm64 的所以就水篇文章记录一下我自己构建的一部分镜像和我用到的镜像

关于 Parallels Desktop Apple Silicon Mac

打开 Parallels Desktop Apple Silicon Mac

点击 Try Technical Preview , 然后注册一下就好了，因为 Beta 版，所以免费使用

Docker 镜像

NAME REPOSITORY
AdGuard Home adguard/adguardhome
Gitlab CE sorajin/gitlab-ce-arm64
Jenkins sorajin/jenkins-arm64
Switch Lan Play Server sorajin/switch-lan-play-server
Switch Lan Play Client sorajin/switch-lan-play-client
data.raw:

去年拿了一个省政府奖学金然后存是不可能去存的，所以就去买了一个 Mac Mini 2020 玩玩，结果到手后发现 Docker Desktop 还没适配emmm，不过还好还有 Parallels Desktop，然后就装了一个虚拟机去跑 Docker 了，然后就发现，gitlab-ce 之类的官方镜像都没有 arm64 的所以就~~水~~篇文章记录一下我自己构建的一部分镜像和我用到的镜像

### 关于 Parallels Desktop Apple Silicon Mac

打开 [Parallels Desktop Apple Silicon Mac](https://www.parallels.com/blogs/parallels-desktop-apple-silicon-mac/) 

点击 Try Technical Preview , 然后注册一下就好了，因为 Beta 版，所以免费使用

### Docker 镜像

| NAME                   | REPOSITORY                     |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| AdGuard Home           | adguard/adguardhome            |
| Gitlab CE              | sorajin/gitlab-ce-arm64        |
| Jenkins                | sorajin/jenkins-arm64          |
| Switch Lan Play Server | sorajin/switch-lan-play-server |
| Switch Lan Play Client | sorajin/switch-lan-play-client |
|                        |                                |

data.title: Hello World
data.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!-- more -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
